name: F***ing Birds (TriJam103)
description:
F___ing Birds

Some birds are staying on my dad's tree, they can't do that !

Gotta shot them all.

How to play :

  • Hold Left-click to charge shot
  • Release left-click to destroy cells

Sources : https://github.com/ChristopheClaustre/Trijam103

Made with :

  • Unity
  • Gimp
  • Inkscape
  • Blender
  • Ableton
Made for Trijam103 Theme: Family Tree.

Made in 13h (instead of 6h). I wanted to make more effects that would be stopped by zawarudo, but there is enough extra time for this jam.

Credits

  • Code and graphics by kack3y.
  • Music by synack.
  • Zawarudo from jjba
  • Assets :
    • https://fr.3dexport.com/free-3dmodel-low-poly-trees-258353.htm - trees and rocks
    • https://www.cgtrader.com/items/889653/download-page - slingshot and its sounds effects
    • https://www.cgtrader.com/items/2145680/download-page - bird
    • https://www.cgtrader.com/items/2412255/download-page - bullets
    • https://www.cgtrader.com/items/812442/download-page - skybox
